urls.title: Successful first year for waste crime taskforce despite pandemic

We joined forces with partners to form the Joint Unit for Waste Crime, to share intelligence and work in innovative ways to disrupt waste criminals.

urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, river and sea levels, check the 5-day forecast or use flood risk maps

tweets.text:
This covers the following areas: Bawtry, Bentley, Conisborough, Clay Lane, Fishlake, Intake, Mexborough, Scawthorpe, Tickhill and Wadworth.

Please stay alert and check flood warnings regularly @EnvAgencyYNE and check your area here https://t.co/PhaiEsZrkk

Devastating report confirms the dreadful state of the Cam and its chalk stream tributaries but water companies and @EnvAgency escape blame. (Not surprisingly given Cambridge Water co-commissioned it) @CamLabEF   @greenarteries  @CPRECambs @Feargal_Sharkey  https://t.co/tbBkUTPpnN

@tinaonions @CharnwoodBC @benvolresponder @LR4x4Response @MountsorrelPar1 @needham_laurie @CharnwoodPolice @EnvAgencyMids @BBCLeicester @leicslive @fosse107 @BarrowPC @SilebyPC @Syston_TC @SystonTownNews @Thurmastontimes @AnsteyLibrary @bvillagecc Looking at that weather report @tinaonions , I think you're going to need a snorkel fitted to your e-moped!

The river is also topping the floodbanks elsewhere throughout the #LDV, and is currently roaring over the banks at North Duffield, leaving Garganey Hide submerged. The large number of waders and shallower feeding dabbling ducks present recently have now been forced elsewhere. https://t.co/EvEu5NgJfy

urls.title: Find out if you're at risk of flooding in England
urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, check the 5-day forecast or use flood maps

tweets.text: We are expecting heavy rainfall in many places across the #Midlands this week. #PrepareActSurvive Get the latest flood info & sign up to receive flood warnings here: https://t.co/6jAgryn4Al https://t.co/YxjhWTVzVq

Our flood forecast shows the areas at risk of flooding over the next 5 days. Take action now - check your flood risk and sign up to our flood warning service for the latest info:  https://t.co/6jAgryn4Al #floodaware https://t.co/l5nqRpmidI

If you think you maybe at #Flood risk with the potential bad weather  Are you signed up for @EnvAgency #flood warnings?  Plan NOW what you are going to do -where you'll put your car & belongings to a place of safety. Check you remember how to install any #PFR products & stay safe

tweets.text: Leeds case rate down further to 310 per 100k people - a 13% reduction in a week. Positivity down to 11.3%. Please stay in if you can, wear a mask where required & keep your distance. Weather improving too but keep an eye out for @EnvAgencyYNE for any flood warnings as snow melts

With spells of prolonged and heavy rain expected in the coming days, please keep up to date with the latest flood information from @EnvAgencyYNE here 👇🌧️ https://t.co/v5PdgoFxOj

@Mainstay_Marine  boat builders based in Pembroke Dock, are currently building 5 barges for @EnvAgency.  Prize of £200 to put towards outdoor learning for the Pembs school that suggests the best 5 names! dm for details on how to enter! @PembsOutdoorSch @mh_port @SchoolsPembs

tweets.text:
We’d suggest following our partners @ENVAgencyYNE to stay up to date with the situation as well.

@TravelSYorks can help if you’re planning an essential bus or train journeys and how the weather may impact it (though where possible we’d suggest staying at home).

The ground is saturated and heavy, persistent rain is forecast in the coming days ☔️🦆

Check the @EnvAgencyYNE for Flood Warnings

Please don’t enter or drive through flood water ⚠️ https://t.co/nOWSiRfqQw

Met Office has issued Amber & Yellow alerts for heavy rain from tomorrow morning until Thursday.

Flood alerts are in place for South Yorkshire. Make sure you are prepared in the event of flooding and follow @EnvAgency & @EnvAgencyYNE for updates.

➡️ https://t.co/EUSqZinZO1 https://t.co/k5B4XoLZRg

urls.title: Get the latest updates by email - Doncaster Council
urls.description: Complete the form below to receive the latest updates.

tweets.text: Whilst we will share everything we can on our social media channels, we’ll also be providing email updates on the situation, so if you haven’t signed up to our mailing list yet, you can do so here: https://t.co/E7TU0PsvNJ

Our officers have been out patrolling defences at Metheringham Delph ahead of this week’s forecast rain. If you’re worried about flooding, make sure you sign up for free flood warnings from @EnvAgency https://t.co/nvMF75JN9W #floodaware https://t.co/OD8UKn7p7S
Weather warnings and high river levels delay start of #Foss Barrier replacement work in #York #YorkNews Latest from @EnvAgencyYNE is here https://t.co/LhzBZ2zdib

⚠️ An amber flood warning is in place for all of #SouthYorkshire from tomorrow morning. 

Make sure you’re following @EnvAgencyYNE for the latest info, and you can sign up to receive flood warnings here: https://t.co/djzzUXttot. https://t.co/KOEu35oi8F

The @EnvAgencyYNE have alerted me to the precautionary measures they've taken are taking to protect York from snow melts and rainfall, as the ground is quite saturated. We are not expecting flooding, but please be careful by the river - it is very cold and fast flowing

tweets.text: Significant rainfall is expected this week. If you must travel, do not drive through flood water, and please check flood warnings for free here (updated every 15 minutes): https://t.co/CnoJPZIDpY. #PrepareActSurvive Here's what the warnings mean: https://t.co/m8NDEpoH4M
